messages.content: Can‚Äôt sleep so got on my phone. Stupid. Anyway please do not apologize. I was feeling shitty from painting all day not from you!! And I don‚Äôt want you to keep things under wraps‚Ä¶. We are in this together and you don‚Äôt have to ‚Äúcontrol‚Äù your head around me.

Sorry you couldn‚Äôt sleep. Hope things are ok.  I am just getting going this morning.  J and I exploded last night kind of where you and Andrew were a few weeks ago, except I don‚Äôt expect her to try for any more cuddles or anything more based on where it ended.  Just hoping to level it out and proceed.
I did speak to her briefly this morning and think I was able to level set.  We shall see
Anyways hitting the shower now cannot wait to see you tomorrow.  Hope your day goes well. Will be around if you are bored I have a slow day.

Oh the Andrew thing did get into my head the other night.  I don‚Äôt know if j is still bouncing around in yours that way but, hard to think about that..  I can let
You know that I feel like as of Sat morning there will
W no suggestions of any kind of reconciliation, no more overtures or invitations or requests
Of any kind.  So if that helps your head, you have nothing to worry about there whatsoever.  I think we‚Äôre our situations reversed you might have a tough time thinking about j and I at the cottage is all.  lol man. This is like no situation ever is it.  It is like you are getting together with someone who is literally living with their ex who is trying to get back together with them on both sides of the fence.. insane tricks on the mind.  Just cannot wait for tomorrow then Thursday then Detroit then Chatham then everything else.  Luv you have a good day.

It‚Äôs definitely a fucked up situation. Anytime there is silence from you I‚Äôm also wondering if you both are having some sort of productive conversation where things shift. Or your girls say something that impacts a shift in your head. If you and j were at the cottage together‚Ä¶ yeah I guess that would mess with my head a bit potentially. The reality is that this place is just a second home and there are just as many bad memories here as at home (we lived here during Covid so‚Ä¶) so my reality is that this isn‚Äôt entirely a lovely vacation home and more a second home with all the work and drudgery that comes with our other place in Toronto.
For the record, j absolutely bounces around in my head. I saw you two together at work when we sat near each other and she would go to your desk. So i kind of saw how you guys interacted at that time at work at least. So I can easily get visions in my head bc of that. I do compartmentalize it away though so I don‚Äôt go crazy with everything else going on. Just being honest. Healthy not healthy‚Ä¶ survival mechanism. Not sure. üôà
Andrew is in a good mood and leaving me alone bc I agreed to the cottage thing. It is what he cares about most in the world. üôÑ

Just sorting out some stuff this morning changing a bit with my diet, going off the 16  hour fasts to include lunch again. Trying a few other things.. down 15 lbs this morning, so feeling good about that at least.  I also talked to maddie ahe does want to come with me but she is being supportive of j right now because of all going on and she thinks I am stronger..
I wish I had your skills at compartmentalization
I am also going to look for a therapist tonight just for me.. I think I need one too.
Love you.
